# Michael Edwards (football executive)

Michael Edwards is an English football director who is the chief executive of football for  club Liverpool.
Early life
Edwards attended the University of Sheffield in England.
Career
In his first spell at the club, Edwards worked as the sporting director of English Premier League side Liverpool from 2016 until 2022, and is credited with signings that supported Liverpool's successful 2019-20 title winning season. He was rehired by the club's owners Fenway Sports Group in 2024 as their chief executive of football, overseeing all football operations at the club.
Personal life
Edwards is a native of Southampton, England.
